Title: Japan PM Ishiba's cabinet approval hits record low, Asahi reports

Title: Brazil's Bolsonaro blasts election ban as 'denial of democracy'

Title: Iran-backed Yemen rebels say attacked US carrier after air strike...

Title: Trump, Putin will speak this week on Russia-Ukraine war, US envoy...

Title: Netanyahu seeks to dismiss Israel's internal security chief as po...

Description: Pope Francis acknowledged on Sunday being fragile and 'facing a period of trial,' as he thanked well-wishers for prayers in a message from hospital, where he has been receiving treatment for pneumonia.

Title: 51 dead, more than 100 injured in nightclub fire in North Macedon...

Title: China brings back 3,000 suspects from Myanmar cyber scam hub afte...
Description: China has repatriated nearly 3,000 telecoms fraud suspects from Myanmar since launching a joint crackdown with Myanmar and Thailand earlier this year, according to the top Chinese police authority.

Title: Monster storm pummeling central and southern US sparks tornadoes ...

Title: UN declares N. Korea's detention of S. Korean missionaries arbitr...

Title: Trump attempts to cajole NK into dialogue by calling it 'nuclear ...

After more than three weeks in the hospital, the 88-year-old pope is responding well to treatment and has shown a 'gradual, slight improvement' in recent days.

Title: Divided US Supreme Court rejects Trump bid to freeze nearly $2 bi...

Title: Ukraine plans new talks with US after intelligence sharing ends

Title: China's goals for 2025: five things to know

Description: Korean firms with businesses in Canada and Mexico are bracing for U.S. President Donald Trump's plan to impose tariffs on goods from the two neighboring countries starting this week, industry observers noted Tuesday.

Title: Trade and growth on agenda for key China meeting
Description: China's largest political event of the year begins in Beijing on Tuesday, as U.S. tariffs cast a cloud over closed-door meetings involving thousands of delegates from across the country.

Title: S. Korea condemns N. Korea's warning on US aircraft carrier entry

Description: Chinese manufacturers reported an uptick in orders in February as importers rushed to beat higher U.S. tariffs imposed by President Donald Trump, as a Chinese state media report said that Beijing was considering ways to retaliate.
